trans-unit.source: Represents the <see langword="<td>" /> and <see langword="<th>" /> HTML elements in an <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableRow" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 表示 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableRow" /> 对象中的 <see langword="<td>" /> 和 <see langword="<th>" /> HTML 元素。

trans-unit.source: The `<td>` element represents a data cell in a table, while the `<th>` element represents a table heading cell.
trans-unit.target: `<td>`元素表示表中的数据单元格时`<th>`元素表示表标题单元格。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCell> class to programmatically control the `<td>` and `<th>` HTML elements in an <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableRow> object.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCell>类以编程方式控制`<td>`和`<th>`中的 HTML 元素<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableRow>对象。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCell> class allows you to customize the appearance of a cell in a table by specifying the background color, the border color, the height, and the width.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCell>类，可以通过指定的背景色、 的边框颜色、 高度和宽度自定义的表中的单元格的外观。

trans-unit.source: These attributes are set using the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCell.BgColor%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCell.BorderColor%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCell.Height%2A>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCell.Width%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: 使用设置这些属性<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCell.BgColor%2A>， <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCell.BorderColor%2A>， <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCell.Height%2A>，和<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCell.Width%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: You can control how the content of a cell is displayed by specifying the vertical and horizontal alignment of the contents.
trans-unit.target: 你可以控制如何通过指定内容的垂直和水平对齐方式显示单元格的内容。

trans-unit.source: You can also specify whether the content automatically continues on the next line when the end of the cell is reached.
trans-unit.target: 你还可以指定是否内容自动在下一行时继续到达该单元格的末尾。

trans-unit.source: The horizontal alignment is controlled by the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCell.Align%2A> property, while the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCell.VAlign%2A> property controls the vertical alignment.
trans-unit.target: 由控制的水平对齐方式<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCell.Align%2A>属性，而<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCell.VAlign%2A>属性控制的垂直对齐方式。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCell.NoWrap%2A> property indicates whether text wrapping is disabled.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCell.NoWrap%2A>属性指示是否禁用文本换行。

trans-unit.source: By using the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCell.ColSpan%2A> or the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCell.RowSpan%2A> property, you can control the number of columns or rows that a cell occupies.
trans-unit.target: 通过使用<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCell.ColSpan%2A>或<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCell.RowSpan%2A>属性，可以控制的列或单元格所占据的行数。

trans-unit.source: For example, you can create a cell that occupies two columns in a table by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCell.ColSpan%2A> property to `2`.
trans-unit.target: 例如，你可以创建占用表中的两个列，通过设置单元格<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCell.ColSpan%2A>属性`2`。

trans-unit.source: For a list of initial property values for an instance of <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCell>, see the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCell.%23ctor%2A> constructor.
trans-unit.target: 有关的实例的初始属性值的列表<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCell>，请参阅<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCell.%23ctor%2A>构造函数。

trans-unit.source: This control can be used to display user input, which might include malicious client script.
trans-unit.target: 此控件可用来显示用户输入，这可能包含恶意客户端脚本。

trans-unit.source: Check any information that is sent from a client for executable script, SQL statements, or other code before displaying it in your application.
trans-unit.target: 检查从客户端可执行的脚本、 SQL 语句或其他代码之前发送在你的应用程序中显示它的任何信息。

trans-unit.source: ASP.NET provides an input request validation feature to block script and HTML in user input.
trans-unit.target: ASP.NET 提供的一输入的请求验证功能块脚本和 HTML 在用户输入。

trans-unit.source: Validation server controls are also provided to assess user input.
trans-unit.target: 验证服务器控件还提供用于评估用户输入。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Validation Server Control Syntax](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/96d2c59e-693c-4079-9b53-b3ff0d9e9133).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[验证服务器控件语法](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/96d2c59e-693c-4079-9b53-b3ff0d9e9133)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use an <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCell> to modify the contents of a cell in a table.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCell>修改表中的单元格的内容。

trans-unit.source: Note that the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable.Rows%2A> collection of an <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable> control contains a collection of the rows (<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableRow> objects) in the table.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable.Rows%2A>集合<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable>控件包含一个行集合 (<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableRow>对象) 表中。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableRow.Cells%2A> collection of an <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableRow> object is a collection of the cells (<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCell> objects) in a row.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableRow.Cells%2A>集合<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableRow>对象是单元格的集合 (<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCell>对象) 行中。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCell" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCell" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCell" /> class using default values.
trans-unit.target: 使用默认值初始化 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCell" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: Use this constructor to create and initialize a new instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCell> class.
trans-unit.target: 使用此构造函数来创建和初始化的新实例<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCell>类。

trans-unit.source: This constructor is used to create an <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCell> object that represents the `<td>` element for a table data cell.
trans-unit.target: 此构造函数用于创建<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCell>对象，表示`<td>`表数据单元格的元素。

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the initial property value for an instance of <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCell>.
trans-unit.target: 下表显示的实例的初始属性值<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCell>。

trans-unit.source: Property
trans-unit.target: Property

trans-unit.source: Initial Value
trans-unit.target: 初始值

trans-unit.source: The "td" literal string.
trans-unit.target: "Td"文字字符串。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to create an instance of an <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable> control with <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCell> controls and place the table on the Web page.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何创建的实例<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable>控件替换为<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCell>控制，并将表放在网页上。

trans-unit.source: Note how the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCell> control's default constructor is used to create a `<td>` element, while its overloaded constructor that takes a string parameter is used with the literal string "th" to create a `<th>` element.
trans-unit.target: 请注意如何<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCell>控件的默认构造函数用于创建`<td>`元素，其采用字符串参数的重载构造函数替换为文本字符串"th"来同时创建`<th>`元素。

trans-unit.source: The element name of the tag.
trans-unit.target: 标记的元素名。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCell" /> class, using the specified tag name.
trans-unit.target: 用指定的标记名初始化 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCell" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: Use this constructor to create and initialize a new instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCell> class.
trans-unit.target: 使用此构造函数来创建和初始化的新实例<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCell>类。

trans-unit.source: It allows you to create an <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCell> object that represents a cell in an <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable> control.
trans-unit.target: 它允许你创建<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCell>对象，表示中的单元格<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable>控件。

trans-unit.source: It is commonly used to create an <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCell> object that represents a `<th>` element for a table heading cell.
trans-unit.target: 它通常用于创建<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCell>对象，表示`<th>`表标题单元格的元素。

trans-unit.source: Although you can use this constructor to create a `<td>` element for a table data cell, you typically use the default constructor.
trans-unit.target: 虽然可以使用此构造函数来创建`<td>`元素对于表数据单元，你通常使用默认构造函数。

trans-unit.source: Although this constructor allows you to specify the cell element to create, the `<th>` element is the only supported cell element.
trans-unit.target: 虽然此构造函数允许你指定的单元格元素，若要创建，`<th>`元素是唯一受支持的单元格元素。

trans-unit.source: For future compatibility, this constructor allows you to create other HTML cell elements that could become available.
trans-unit.target: 为将来的兼容性，此构造函数，可创建其他 HTML 单元格元素，可能会变得可用。

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the initial property value for an instance of <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCell>.
trans-unit.target: 下表显示的实例的初始属性值<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCell>。

trans-unit.source: Property
trans-unit.target: Property

trans-unit.source: Initial Value
trans-unit.target: 初始值

trans-unit.source: The value of the `tagName` parameter.
trans-unit.target: `tagName` 参数的值。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to create an instance of an <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable> control with <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCell> controls and place the table on the Web page.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何创建的实例<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable>控件替换为<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCell>控制，并将表放在网页上。

trans-unit.source: Note how the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCell> control's default constructor is used to create a `<td>` element, while its overloaded constructor that takes a string parameter is used with the literal "th" to create a `<th>` element.
trans-unit.target: 请注意如何<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCell>控件的默认构造函数用于创建`<td>`元素，尽管采用字符串参数的重载构造函数使用带有文本"th"来创建`<th>`元素。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the horizontal alignment of the content in the cell represented by an instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCell" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置由 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCell" /> 类的实例所表示的单元格中内容的水平对齐方式。

trans-unit.source: The horizontal alignment of the content in the cell represented by an instance of <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCell" />.
trans-unit.target: 由 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCell" /> 的实例表示的单元格中的内容的水平对齐方式。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see cref="F:System.String.Empty" />, which indicates that this property is not set.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see cref="F:System.String.Empty" />，表示未设置此属性。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCell.Align%2A> property to specify the horizontal alignment of the content in a cell represented by an instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCell> class.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCell.Align%2A>属性指定在单元格中的实例所表示的内容的水平对齐方式<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCell>类。

trans-unit.source: Setting this property affects only the cell represented by an instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCell> class.
trans-unit.target: 设置此属性将影响仅由的实例表示的单元格<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCell>类。

trans-unit.source: To apply the same alignment to the cells of an entire row in the table, set the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableRow.Align%2A> property of the row represented by an instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableRow> class.
trans-unit.target: 若要将相同的对齐方式应用于表中的整个行的单元格，将设置<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableRow.Align%2A>由的实例所表示的行的属性<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableRow>类。

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the values that can be used for this property.
trans-unit.target: 下表列出可用于此属性的值。

trans-unit.source: Value
Description
trans-unit.target: 描述

trans-unit.source: Aligns the contents of a cell with the left edge of the cell.
trans-unit.target: 将包含该单元格的左边缘的单元格的内容的对齐。

trans-unit.source: Aligns the contents of a cell in the middle of the cell.
trans-unit.target: 对齐单元格中居中的内容。

trans-unit.source: Aligns the contents of a cell with the right edge of the cell.
trans-unit.target: 对齐的单元格的右边缘与单元格的内容。

trans-unit.source: You can also use `Justify` and `Char` as values for this property; however, not all browsers support these features.
trans-unit.target: 你还可以使用`Justify`和`Char`为此属性的值; 但是，并非所有浏览器支持这些功能。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCell.Align%2A> property to programmatically control the alignment of the contents of the cells in an <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable> control.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCell.Align%2A>属性以编程方式控制中的单元格的内容的对齐方式<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable>控件。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the background color of the cell represented by an instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCell" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置由 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCell" /> 类的实例所表示的单元格的背景色。

trans-unit.source: The background color of the cell represented by an instance of <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCell" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCell" /> 的实例所表示的单元格的背景色。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCell.BgColor%2A> property to specify the background color of the cell represented by an instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCell> class.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCell.BgColor%2A>属性指定的实例表示的单元格的背景色<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCell>类。

trans-unit.source: You can specify a color either by name or by using a hexadecimal value, preceded by the pound character (#), in the form #RRGGBB.
trans-unit.target: 按名称或使用前面井号字符的十六进制值，则可以指定颜色 （#），在窗体 #RRGGBB 中。

trans-unit.source: RR, GG, and BB represent hexadecimal values from 0 to 255 that indicate the red, green, and blue components of a color, respectively.
trans-unit.target: RR、 GG 和 BB 表示从 0 到 255 分别表示一种颜色，红色、 绿色和蓝色组件十六进制值。

trans-unit.source: For example, the value #0000FF represents the color blue.
trans-unit.target: 例如，值 # 0000ff> 表示的颜色为蓝色。

trans-unit.source: It specifies the minimum value (00) for the red and green components, while specifying the maximum value (FF) for the blue component.
trans-unit.target: 它指定对于红色和绿色的组件，而为蓝色组件指定的最大值 (FF) 的最小值 (00)。

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the sixteen predefined HTML color names and corresponding hexadecimal values that can be used for the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCell.BgColor%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 下表显示了十六个预定义的 HTML 颜色名称和相应的十六进制值，可以用于<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCell.BgColor%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: For more information on HTML colors, see the [World Wide Web Consortium (W3C) Web site](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=37125).
trans-unit.target: 有关 HTML 颜色的详细信息，请参阅[World Wide Web Consortium (W3C) 网站](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=37125)。

trans-unit.source: Color name
trans-unit.target: 颜色名称

trans-unit.source: Hexadecimal value
trans-unit.target: 十六进制值

trans-unit.source: Aqua
trans-unit.target: 浅绿色

trans-unit.source: #00FFFF
trans-unit.target: #00FFFF

trans-unit.source: Black
trans-unit.target: 黑色

trans-unit.source: Blue
trans-unit.target: 蓝色

trans-unit.source: Fuchsia
trans-unit.target: 紫红色

trans-unit.source: #FF00FF
trans-unit.target: #FF00FF

trans-unit.source: Gray
trans-unit.target: 灰色

trans-unit.source: Green
trans-unit.target: 绿色

trans-unit.source: Lime
trans-unit.target: 为浅

trans-unit.source: Maroon
trans-unit.target: 褐紫红色

trans-unit.source: Navy
trans-unit.target: 深蓝色

trans-unit.source: Olive
trans-unit.target: 橄榄

trans-unit.source: Purple
trans-unit.target: 紫色

trans-unit.source: Red
trans-unit.target: 红色

trans-unit.source: Silver
trans-unit.target: 白银

trans-unit.source: #C0C0C0
trans-unit.target: #C0C0C0

trans-unit.source: Teal
trans-unit.target: 青色

trans-unit.source: White
trans-unit.target: 空白

trans-unit.source: #FFFFFF
trans-unit.target: #FFFFFF

trans-unit.source: Yellow
trans-unit.target: 黄色

trans-unit.source: #FFFF00
trans-unit.target: #FFFF00

trans-unit.source: The available colors for use with the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCell.BgColor%2A> property can be determined from the <xref:System.Drawing.KnownColor> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: 与一起使用的可用颜色<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCell.BgColor%2A>属性可以确定从<xref:System.Drawing.KnownColor>枚举。

trans-unit.source: Color names are case-insensitive.
trans-unit.target: 颜色名称不区分大小写。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCell.BgColor%2A> property to programmatically control the background color of the cells in an <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable> control.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCell.BgColor%2A>属性以编程方式控制中的单元格的背景色<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable>控件。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the border color of the cell represented by an instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCell" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置由 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCell" /> 类的实例所表示的单元格的边框颜色。

trans-unit.source: The border color of the cell represented by an instance of <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCell" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCell" /> 的实例所表示的单元格的边框颜色。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCell.BorderColor%2A> property to specify the border color of the cell represented by an instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCell> class.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCell.BorderColor%2A>属性指定的实例表示的单元格的边框颜色<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCell>类。

trans-unit.source: You can specify a color either by name or by using a hexadecimal value, preceded by the pound character (#), in the form #RRGGBB.
trans-unit.target: 按名称或使用前面井号字符的十六进制值，则可以指定颜色 （#），在窗体 #RRGGBB 中。

trans-unit.source: RR, GG, and BB represent hexadecimal values from 0 to 255 that indicate the red, green, and blue components of a color, respectively.
trans-unit.target: RR、 GG 和 BB 表示从 0 到 255 分别表示一种颜色，红色、 绿色和蓝色组件十六进制值。

trans-unit.source: For example, the value #0000FF represents the color blue.
trans-unit.target: 例如，值 # 0000ff> 表示的颜色为蓝色。

trans-unit.source: It specifies the minimum value (00) for the red and green components, while specifying the maximum value (FF) for the blue component.
trans-unit.target: 它指定对于红色和绿色的组件，而为蓝色组件指定的最大值 (FF) 的最小值 (00)。

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the sixteen predefined HTML color names and corresponding hexadecimal values that can be used for the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCell.BorderColor%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 下表显示了十六个预定义的 HTML 颜色名称和相应的十六进制值，可以用于<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCell.BorderColor%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: For more information on HTML colors, see the [World Wide Web Consortium (W3C) Web](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=37125) site.
trans-unit.target: 有关 HTML 颜色的详细信息，请参阅[World Wide Web Consortium (W3C) Web](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=37125)站点。

trans-unit.source: Color name
trans-unit.target: 颜色名称

trans-unit.target: 十六进制值

trans-unit.target: 浅绿色

trans-unit.target: #00FFFF

trans-unit.target: 黑色

trans-unit.target: 蓝色

trans-unit.target: 紫红色

trans-unit.source: #FF00FF
trans-unit.target: #FF00FF

trans-unit.target: 灰色

trans-unit.source: Green
trans-unit.target: 绿色

trans-unit.source: Lime
trans-unit.target: 为浅

trans-unit.source: Maroon
trans-unit.target: 褐紫红色

trans-unit.source: Navy
trans-unit.target: 深蓝色

trans-unit.target: 橄榄

trans-unit.source: Purple
trans-unit.target: 紫色

trans-unit.source: Red
trans-unit.target: 红色

trans-unit.target: 白银

trans-unit.source: #C0C0C0
trans-unit.target: #C0C0C0

trans-unit.source: Teal
trans-unit.target: 青色

trans-unit.target: 空白

trans-unit.target: #FFFFFF

trans-unit.source: Yellow
trans-unit.target: 黄色

trans-unit.source: #FFFF00
trans-unit.target: #FFFF00

trans-unit.source: The available colors for use with the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCell.BorderColor%2A> property can be determined from the <xref:System.Drawing.KnownColor> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: 与一起使用的可用颜色<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCell.BorderColor%2A>属性可以确定从<xref:System.Drawing.KnownColor>枚举。

trans-unit.source: Color names are case-insensitive.
trans-unit.target: 颜色名称不区分大小写。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCell.BorderColor%2A> property to programmatically control the border color of the cells in an <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable> control.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCell.BorderColor%2A>属性以编程方式控制中的单元格的边框颜色<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable>控件。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the number of columns occupied by a cell represented by an instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCell" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置由 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCell" /> 类的实例所表示的单元格占用的列数。

trans-unit.source: The number of columns occupied by the cell represented by an instance of <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCell" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCell" /> 的实例所表示的单元格所占用的列数。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see langword="-1" />, which indicates that this property is not set.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="-1" />，表示未设置此属性。

trans-unit.source: In a cell represented by an instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCell> class, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCell.ColSpan%2A> property to specify the number of columns the cell occupies.
trans-unit.target: 在单元格中的实例表示<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCell>类，而使用<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCell.ColSpan%2A>属性指定的单元格所占据的列数。

trans-unit.source: This allows you to create a cell in the table that occupies more than one column.
trans-unit.target: 这可以占用多个列的表中创建一个单元格。

trans-unit.source: For example, suppose you have a table that contains two columns and two rows.
trans-unit.target: 例如，假设你有一个包含两个列和两个行的表。

trans-unit.source: You can create a table heading cell that spans both columns.
trans-unit.target: 你可以创建跨这两个列的表标题单元格。

trans-unit.source: Set the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCell.ColSpan%2A> property of the leftmost cell in the first row to `2` to indicate that this cell takes up two columns in the table.
trans-unit.target: 设置<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCell.ColSpan%2A>属性到第一行中最左侧单元格`2`以指示该单元格占用表中的两个列。

trans-unit.source: When spanning columns, be sure to define one fewer cell in the row for each column that you span.
trans-unit.target: 当跨列，请务必跨越每个列的行中定义一个更少的单元格。

trans-unit.source: For example, if you span two columns, define one fewer cell in the current row.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果跨两个列，则可定义一个更少的单元格当前行中。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, that row will be longer than the number of columns in the table and the table will not be displayed as expected.
trans-unit.target: 否则为该行将会超过表中的列数和表将不会按预期方式显示。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCell.ColSpan%2A> property to specify that the cell in the first row of the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable> control takes up two columns.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCell.ColSpan%2A>属性指定的第一行中的单元格<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable>控件占用两列。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the height (in pixels) of the cell represented by an instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCell" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置由 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCell" /> 类的实例所表示的单元格的高度（以像素为单位）。

trans-unit.source: The height (in pixels) of the cell represented by an instance of <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCell" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCell" /> 的实例所表示的单元格的高度（以像素为单位）。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see cref="F:System.String.Empty" />, which indicates that this property is not set.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see cref="F:System.String.Empty" />，表示未设置此属性。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCell.Height%2A> property to specify the height (in pixels) of the cell represented by an instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCell> class.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCell.Height%2A>属性指定的实例表示单元格的高度 （以像素为单位）<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCell>类。

trans-unit.source: When you specify the height of a cell, all cells in the same row automatically share that height.
trans-unit.target: 当指定单元格的高度时，在同一行中的所有单元格自动具有同一高度。

trans-unit.source: If you specify a height that is smaller than is required to display the contents of the cell, this property is ignored.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定一个小于显示单元格的内容所需大小的高度，则忽略此属性。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCell.Height%2A> property to programmatically control the height of the cells in the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable> control.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCell.Height%2A>属性以编程方式控制中的单元格的高度<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable>控件。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the text in a cell represented by an instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCell" /> class automatically continues on the next line when it reaches the end of the cell.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示当到达单元格末尾时，由 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCell" /> 类的实例所表示的单元格中的文本是否自动继续在下一行显示。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the text does not automatically wrap in the cell; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果在单元格中文本不自动换行，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则，为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCell.NoWrap%2A> property to specify or determine whether the text in a cell represented by an instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCell> class automatically continues on the next line when it reaches the end of the cell.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCell.NoWrap%2A>属性指定或确定是否在单元格中的文本实例所表示的<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCell>类自动在下一行时继续到达该单元格的结尾。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCell.NoWrap%2A> property to programmatically control whether the text wraps in the cells of an <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable> control.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCell.NoWrap%2A>属性以编程方式控制中的单元格的文本是否换行<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable>控件。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter" /> that receives the rendered content.
trans-unit.target: 接收呈现内容的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter" />。

trans-unit.source: Renders the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCell" /> control's end tag.
trans-unit.target: 呈现 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCell" /> 控件的结束标记。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCell.RenderEndTag%2A> method provides additional formatting after calling the base class's <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlContainerControl.RenderEndTag%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCell.RenderEndTag%2A>方法提供调用基类的之后附加格式设置<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlContainerControl.RenderEndTag%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The additional formatting makes the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCell> control's rendered HTML easier to read by adding a line return after the closing tag.
trans-unit.target: 附加的格式设置使<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCell>控件呈现的 HTML 更易读的结束标记之后添加返回一行。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCell.RenderEndTag%2A> method is used primarily by control developers extending the functionality of the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCell> control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCell.RenderEndTag%2A>主要由控件开发人员扩展功能的使用方法<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCell>控件。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the number of rows occupied by a cell represented by an instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCell" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置由 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCell" /> 类的实例所表示的单元格占用的行数。

trans-unit.source: The number of rows occupied by a cell represented by an instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCell" /> class.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCell" /> 类的实例所表示的单元格占用的行数。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see langword="-1" />, which indicates that this property is not set.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="-1" />，表示未设置此属性。

trans-unit.source: In a cell represented by an instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCell> class, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCell.RowSpan%2A> property to specify the number of rows the cell occupies.
trans-unit.target: 在单元格中的实例表示<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCell>类，而使用<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCell.RowSpan%2A>属性指定的单元格所占据的行数。

trans-unit.source: This allows you to create a cell in the table that occupies more than one row.
trans-unit.target: 这可以占用多个行的表中创建一个单元格。

trans-unit.source: For example, suppose you have a table that contains two columns and two rows.
trans-unit.target: 例如，假设你有一个包含两个列和两个行的表。

trans-unit.source: You can create a column that overlaps both rows.
trans-unit.target: 你可以创建重叠两个行的列。

trans-unit.source: Set the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCell.RowSpan%2A> property of the leftmost cell in the first column to `2` to indicate that this cell takes up two rows in the table.
trans-unit.target: 设置<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCell.RowSpan%2A>属性的第一列中最左侧单元格`2`以指示该单元格占用两个表中的行。

trans-unit.source: When spanning rows, be sure to define one fewer cell in the column for each row that you span.
trans-unit.target: 跨越行时，请务必在跨越每一行的列定义一个更少的单元格。

trans-unit.source: For example, if you span two rows, define one fewer cell in that column.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果跨越两行，则该列中定义一个更少的单元格。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, that column will be longer than the number of rows in the table and the table will not be displayed as expected.
trans-unit.target: 否则为该列将会超过表中的行数和表将不会按预期方式显示。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCell.RowSpan%2A> property to specify that the cell in the first column of the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable> control spans two rows.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCell.RowSpan%2A>属性指定的第一列中的单元格<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable>控件能够跨越两行。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the vertical alignment for the content of a cell represented by an instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCell" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置由 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCell" /> 类的实例所表示的单元格内容的垂直对齐方式。

trans-unit.source: The vertical alignment for the content of a cell represented by an instance of <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCell" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCell" /> 的实例所表示的单元格的内容的垂直对齐方式。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see cref="F:System.String.Empty" />, which indicates that this property is not set.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see cref="F:System.String.Empty" />，表示未设置此属性。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCell.VAlign%2A> property to specify the vertical alignment of the content in a cell represented by an instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCell> class.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCell.VAlign%2A>属性指定在单元格中的实例所表示的内容的垂直对齐方式<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCell>类。

trans-unit.source: Setting this property affects only the cell represented by an instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCell> class.
trans-unit.target: 设置此属性将影响仅由的实例表示的单元格<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCell>类。

trans-unit.source: To apply the same vertical alignment to the cells of an entire row in the table, set the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableRow.VAlign%2A> property of the row represented by an instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableRow> class.
trans-unit.target: 若要将相同的垂直对齐方式应用于表中的整个行的单元格，将设置<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableRow.VAlign%2A>由的实例所表示的行的属性<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableRow>类。

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the values that can be used for this property.
trans-unit.target: 下表列出可用于此属性的值。

trans-unit.source: Value
Description
trans-unit.target: 描述

trans-unit.source: Aligns the contents of a cell with the upper edge of the cell.
trans-unit.target: 将包含该单元格的上边缘的单元格的内容的对齐。

trans-unit.source: Aligns the contents of a cell in the center of the cell.
trans-unit.target: 对齐的单元格的中心中的单元格的内容。

trans-unit.source: Aligns the contents of a cell with the lower edge of the cell.
trans-unit.target: 将包含该单元格的下边缘的单元格的内容的对齐。

trans-unit.source: You can also use `BaseLine` as a value for this property.
trans-unit.target: 你还可以使用`BaseLine`作为此属性的值。

trans-unit.source: However, not all browsers support this feature.
trans-unit.target: 但是，并非所有浏览器都支持此功能。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCell.VAlign%2A> property to programmatically control the vertical alignment of the contents of the cells in an <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable> control.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCell.VAlign%2A>属性以编程方式控制中的单元格的内容的垂直对齐方式<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable>控件。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the width (in pixels) of the cell represented by an instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCell" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置由 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCell" /> 类的实例所表示的单元格的宽度（以像素为单位）。

trans-unit.source: The width (in pixels) of the cell represented by an instance of <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCell" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCell" /> 的实例所表示的单元格的宽度（以像素为单位）。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see cref="F:System.String.Empty" />, which indicates that this property is not set.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see cref="F:System.String.Empty" />，表示未设置此属性。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCell.Width%2A> property to specify the width (in pixels) of the cell represented by an instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCell> class.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCell.Width%2A>属性指定的实例表示单元格的宽度 （以像素为单位）<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCell>类。

trans-unit.source: When you specify the width for a cell, all cells in the same column automatically share that width.
trans-unit.target: 当你指定的单元格的宽度时，同一列中的所有单元格自动共享该宽度。

trans-unit.source: If you specify a width that is smaller than is required to display the contents of the cell, this property is ignored.
trans-unit.target: 如果您指定了小于显示单元格的内容所需大小的宽度，则忽略此属性。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCell.Width%2A> property to programmatically control the width of the cells in the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable> control.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCell.Width%2A>属性以编程方式控制中的单元格的宽度<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable>控件。
